‚öôÔ∏è The choice between **imperfect (imperfecto)** and **preterite (pret√©rito indefinido)** depends on how we perceive the action in the past.

üîπ **IMPERFECT (IMPERFECTO)** ‚Üí Ongoing action, habit, description

‚û°Ô∏è *Mientras estudiaba, son√≥ el tel√©fono.* (While I was studying, the phone rang.)

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Context / Background** of a story
‚û°Ô∏è *Hac√≠a fr√≠o y llov√≠a.* (It was cold and it was raining.)
